Package demolition

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
demolition.Entity
demolition.Enemy
public class Enemy
extends demolition.Entity
The enemy class. Defines an enemy object which has a unique animation and collision detection.

    • SPRITE_OFFSET_Y

      public static final int SPRITE_OFFSET_Y
      The y offset the sprite. This is the offset that the sprite is drawn relative to the position of the enemy.
